room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Lockbusters Escape Game in Orlando
review: We did the bank escaoe with 6 total and had a blast. It was very challenging but not to the point of being frustrating. We have done 2 rooms here now and are going to make aure to come back and try all of them!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Lockbusters Escape Game in Orlando
review: Love love love Lockbusters great rooms. We have done 2 rooms and they are awesome recommend then both Chopper Down and the Bank Heist.

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Lockbusters Escape Game in Orlando
review: My wife and our friend FREQUENT escape rooms. We have been to multiple rooms in Orlando and this one blew me away with detail, friendliness and the puzzles. Great place, great customer service. Gabe and Jesse were awesome. We will come back and finish all rooms!
